thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Selwyn Postan

author: Selwyn Postan
title: Selwyn Postan
text: Everything went smoothly and without a glitch. Although I was able to reserve all seating almost immediately after payment went through and confirmation was received, I was unable to get assistance in reserving an isle seat on one of the 4 legs of my flight. I have a medical condition and need an isle seat to extend my legs. I was told to call back in 48 hours to see if I could get the one leg changed.
